com.cyc.baseclient.nl

Class Paraphraser<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cyc.baseclient.nl.Paraphraser<E>

  • public abstract class Paraphraser<E>
extends Object
    Interface for generating structured paraphrases of terms. Paraphraser objects provide the ability to generate natural language strings for CycL objects (e.g. sentences and terms). The basic Paraphraser implementation available from baseclient will provide very basic paraphrasing functionality. If the NL API is available on the classpath, the getInstance methods of this class will return a paraphraser that is more flexible. The BasicParaphraser (returned if only the baseclient is available) is compatible with all versions of Cyc (including OpenCyc).
